name: Flappy Pixel
description:
Overview:

Help 'Pixel', the flying white square, to flap through the evil gray rectangles! Try to get the highest scores !!!

Check out the game also on GameJolt:

http://gamejolt.com/games/arcade/flappy-pixel/23016/

Controls:

  • Up Keyboard Arrow: Flap
  • Mouse Left Click: Flap

Observations:

  • This game was made targeting QVGA resolution (320x240).
  • This game was made for the 2014's February's "Flappy Jam", whose aim was to “make a hard, almost impossible game, inspired (not ripped) from classics”.

Hashtags:

#flappyjam
